data.eml:eml: Eulimacrostoma gen. nov., a new genus of Eulimidae (Gastropoda, Caenogastropoda) with description of a new species and reevaluation of other western Atlantic species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Souza, Leonardo Santos de, Pimenta, Alexandre Dias (2019): Eulimacrostoma gen. nov., a new genus of Eulimidae (Gastropoda, Caenogastropoda) with description of a new species and reevaluation of other western Atlantic species. Zoosystematics and Evolution 95 (2): 403-415, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.95.33880, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.95.33880
